subject: Sites that prohibit MP3 downloads
text:
I think what tos-dr is doing is excellent and wish you every success.

I've accumulated a list of Internet connection services that prohibit
the downloading or making available for download of MP3 files. Not any
other formats, just MP3, which they seem to think is a kind of malware.
It isn't clear from your description whether multiple single-point
reports in one email are useful, but I hope this is useful. (Oh, and I
consider the blanket prohibition on a file format a bad thing.)

It's interesting that several of these terms pages have nearly identical
wording.



Martha's Vineyard Vacation Homes
http://www.vineyardvacationhomes.com/InternetUsuagePolicyforMVVH.html

Your transmission, distribution, request to receive or storage of any
material over the Martha's Vineyard Vacation Homes network or by means
of a Martha's Vineyard Vacation Homes service (directly or indirectly)
shall not: .... (e) contain any viruses, Trojan horses, worms, time
bombs, cancelbots or other computer programming routines that are
intended to damage, interfere with, intercept or expropriate any system,
data or personal information, including, without limitation, ;Pirated
software;, ;Hackers programs or archives;, ;Warez Sites;, ;Irc Bots;, or
;Mp3.;



DSL in Maryland (not a government service)
http://www.dslinmaryland.com/aup.pdf

Your transmission, distribution, request to receive or storage of any
material over the DSL in Maryland network or by means of a DSL in
Maryland service (directly or indirectly) shall not: (e) contain any
viruses, Trojan horses, worms, time bombs, cancelbots or other computer
programming routines that are intended to damage, interfere with,
intercept or expropriate any system, data or personal information,
including, without limitation, "Pirated software", "Hackers programs or
archives", "Warez Sites", "Irc Bots", or "Mp3."


Image Design Systems
http://www.imaginedesign.com.au/terms.htm

5.1.7 Examples of non-acceptable content or links: Pirated software;
Hackers programs or archives; Warez Sites; Irc Bots; Mp3 or any other
method of distributing copyrighted music/sounds.

[No exemption for being the copyright holder or having permission is
mentioned, and even links are non-acceptable, so presumably you can't
link to iTunes.]


InternetMyWay
http://www.internetmyway.com/agreement.html

Your transmission, distribution of any material over the InternetMyWay
network or by means of a InternetMyWay service (directly or indirectly)
shall not: ... (e) contain any viruses, Trojan horses, worms or other
computer programming routines that are intended to damage, interfere
with, intercept or expropriate any system, data or personal information,
including, without limitation, "Pirated software", "Hackers programs or
archives", "Warez Sites", "Irc Bots", or "Mp3."


Moon Web Design, Web hosting AUP
http://www.moonwebdesign.co.uk/a-u-p.shtml

Examples of non-acceptable content or links: "Pirated software",
"Hackers programs or archives", "Warez Sites", "Irc Bots", "Mp3",
"Pornography".


With Web Scorpion "high speed quality hosting," MP3 downloads or links
to music sites that use MP3 are an absolute no-no (AAC seems to be
allowed, though).
http://www.webscorpion.com/legal.php

In summary, the following are STRICTLY NOT PERMITTED on our servers:
... Warez, Hacking/Cracking, MP3 files (including links to/from)


Marina Wifi
http://www.marinawifilc.com/SignUp.htm

Your transmission, distribution, request to receive or storage of any
material over the MarinaWiFi LC network or by means of a MarinaWiFi LC
service (directly or indirectly) shall not: ... (e) contain any viruses,
Trojan horses, worms, time bombs, cancelbots or other computer
programming routines that are intended to damage, interfere with,
intercept or expropriate any system, data or personal information,
including, without limitation, "Pirated software", "Hackers programs or
archives", "Warez Sites", "Irc Bots", or "Mp3."


Host Cabin
http://www.hostcabin.com/?serv=aup

Examples of unacceptable content or links: Pirated software, Hacker's
programs or archives, Warez Sites, IRC Bots,Mp3.



-- 
Gary McGath            garym@mcgath.com

-- 
www.tos-dr.info // www.twitter.com/tosdr // www.github.com/Unhosted/ToS-DR
